author: assaf
msg: Activity list now broken across dates and includes time.  Activity list in task is similar.
Activity no longer requires person, but always gets modified_by.
Completed list similar to activity list.
Task view shows status (completed, suspended, etc), priority and task title.
Significant improvement to tabular task list.

author: dblevins
msg: Previous commit message (revision 662623) was supposed to be:
Key the Entity and MappedSuperclass objects by the "class" attribute
Fixed resulting test case incompatabilities -- the "class" attribute is required to be unique

author: wrowe
msg: Move dist/ site files within site/dist/ as httpd has it
